title: Water Level Rising
description: The water has reached the first floor of homes.

title: People on Rooftops
description: At least 10 people stranded on a rooftop waiting for help.

title: No Electricity
description: Power outage since midnight, water entering transformer stations.

title: Medical Emergency
description: Elderly woman requires immediate evacuation and medical help.

title: Blocked Roads
description: All main roads leading to the area are submerged.
